basics.name: Georgios Giatsidis
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: I’ve amassed over four years’ experience in software engineering. I hold a BSc in Computer Engineering from the University of Thessaly and an MSc in Computer Science and Technology from the University of Macedonia.

work.name: BetAdvanced
work.summary:
- Develop new user-facing features, optimize existing ones
- Implement highly responsive and reusable user interface components for our platform using React.js
- Developed a UI component-based system that is used across our platform
- Participated in the design of a custom page builder that creates unique page layouts
- Worked in the rewrite of the live betting platform that consumes real-time data through web sockets
- Involvement in the Redesign/Refactoring of the accounting system (user preferences, responsible gaming, reality check, self-restriction, self-exclusion, two-factor authentication, document identification etc)
- Design, engineer, maintain REST API endpoints
- Created internal JavaScript libraries using build tools such as npm, babel, rollup and webpack
- Participate in design and code reviews
- Collaborate with other team members to prioritize tasks, understand requirements and propose solutions
- Participate in the recruitment process
- Contribute to the tech decisions

work.name: Kidsproject
work.summary:
- Rewrote the kidsproject.gr platform aiming at better scalability, reliability, availability, and security 
- Designed, developed, and maintained the new back-end of the kidsproject.gr platform
- Selected the tech stack (Typescript, Node.js, MySQL, Redis, React, CSS in JS, Webpack, AWS)
- Designed, developed, and maintained the front-end view of the Administrator Panel of the platform
- Migrated existing product from a bare metal server to AWS (Elastic Beanstalk, EC2, RDS, ElasticCache, S3, Cloudfront)
- Migrated from MSSQL to MYSQL including old data
- Automated deployments on AWS
- CI/CD of the front-end and the back-end using Github Actions
- API monitoring and error logging integrations (New Relic, Papertrail)
- Development of a Node.js framework that generates flexible REST endpoints (CRUD operations, nested filtering, sorting, pagination, etc) and controllers from ORM models
- Added support for role-based JWT authentication, authorization, validation, and more
- Created and maintained live and development environments
- Payments Integrations
- EveryPay Marketplace integration (Sellers Management, Split payments)
- Server-Side Rendering, SEO Optimizations

work.name: GT Sports Leagues
work.summary:
- Participated in the tech stack selection process (NodeJs, PostgreSQL, Redis, React, CSS in JS, Webpack)
- Designed, developed, and maintained the front-end view of the GT Leagues e-sports platform
- CI/CD of the front end using Github Actions
- Automated deployments on Heroku/AWS
- Contributed to the REST API of the platform
- Developed import functionality from CSV to relational database tables
- Implemented a reusable CRUD frontend framework that conforms to REST principles/JWT
- Participated in code reviews/reviewed colleague's code
